config.description: Analyze RBF overhead vs simulation time

tuning_runs.result: PASSED - RBF overhead negligible (0.03ms vs 375ms simulation)

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - Expected ~10% rejection rate (same as early rejection)

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - Best case: 3 sims saved (~6% reduction), not worth complexity
tuning_runs.notes: CMA-ES covariance adaptation is already implicit surrogate modeling.

finding: CMA-ES covariance adaptation is already implicit surrogate modeling. Low rejection rate (~10%) and small population (6-8) mean minimal benefit (~6% sim reduction). surrogate_hybrid family EXHAUSTED.
